participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.background: I miss playing outside with my friends in the summer. I like Italian cuisine. I like the color blue. My favorite artist is Justin Bieber. I enjoy doing DIY projects in my free time, especially drywall work.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.background: I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood. I like to eat soft foods that are easy to digest when I am confined to my bed. I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings. I work as a trauma surgeon. My cat's name is Leroy Jenkins.

content.text: Hi there, I am interested in getting to know you better. What are your favorite things to do?
Hello there! I like to collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood.
That's such a sweet idea! I love looking at children's books and books with beautiful illustrations. What is your favorite type of book?
I really enjoy picture books and fairytales, although I don't mind reading a good chapter book now and then. How about you?
I love picture books and graphic novels! I'm not too big on fairytales, but I do enjoy a good mystery or adventure book.
That's great! I love all kinds of books, but I do tend to gravitate towards books that are a little more lighthearted and fun.
That makes sense! I think it's important to have a variety of books to read, so you can always find something that you're in the mood for.
Exactly! I love that you can find a book for any mood or occasion. Do you have any favorite authors?
I have so many favorite authors! I love Roald Dahl, Shel Silverstein, and J.K. Rowling. How about you?
I love Roald Dahl! I also love Dr. Seuss and Maurice Sendak. I'm a big fan of children's literature in general.
Me too! I think children's literature is so important. It can teach kids so much about the world and help them develop their imaginations.
I agree! It's also a great way to get kids excited about reading.
That's true! I'm glad we agree on that. I think we're going to get along just fine.
